vsParam:
Alright, it's about time...
Oh, over here, Wistyria~

The transfer ceremony is done.

Hehe, congrats, Wistyria.
Now you're a student of the Academy now.

Yeah, finally I'm entitled to call you "Senpai"!
Right, [px] Senpai!
It makes me a bit embarrassed...

Heehee, right?
I'll call you Senpai every day!

Oh, yeah? [px] Senpai ♪
Hehe, doesn't it sound great~

... It kind of makes me feel I'm not a student, so I'm
a little hurt.

Come on, it doesn't matter if we feel we're students.
Just let her! Wistyria, call me Senpai, hurry!

Oh... I'm getting envious! I want that too!
Call me Senpai too!

All right, cut it out. Right, maybe we can go out
for fun to celebrate her pass?

Oh, good idea.
Hehe, let's go have something delicious.

Huh, shall we!?
Wonderful~ Sorel Senpai, Anis Senpai, I love you so much!

Great~ [px], I love you so much too!
